content.question: ​A polynomial function <math alttext="p"><mi>p</mi></math> has three distinct zeros each with multiplicity <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math>, and its leading coefficient is positive. The polynomial function <math alttext="q"><mi>q</mi></math> has exactly one zero with multiplicity <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math>, and its leading coefficient is negative. The rational function <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> can be written as the quotient of <math alttext="p"><mi>p</mi></math> and <math alttext="q"><mi>q</mi></math> by <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator p open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator q open parentheses x close parentheses end fraction"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>q</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfrac></math>. Which of the following statements about <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> must be true?

choices.label: ​The graph of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> has a horizontal asymptote at <math alttext="y equals 0"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>.

​The graph of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> has a horizontal asymptote at <math alttext="y equals a"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi></math>, where <math alttext="a greater than 0"><mi>a</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>.

​The graph of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> has a horizontal asymptote at <math alttext="y equals a"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi></math>, where <math alttext="a less than 0"><mi>a</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></math>.
​The graph of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> has no horizontal asymptote.

content.answer: ​The graph of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> has a horizontal asymptote at <math alttext="y equals a"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi></math>, where <math alttext="a less than 0"><mi>a</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
